name: Cairo-Dock (Fallback Mode)
summary: Light and eye-candy filled dock and desklets for your desktop.
description:
Cairo-Dock is a pretty, light and convenient interface to your desktop, able to replace advantageously your system panel! It features multi-docks, taskbar, launchers and a lot of useful applets. Applets can be detached from the dock to act as desktop widgets. Numerous ready-to-use themes are downloadable in 1 click, and can be easily customized at your convenience. It can use hardware acceleration to be very fast and low on CPU.

Some screenshots are available : http://pics.glx-dock.org Development site: https://launchpad.net/cairo-dock

This package is the core of Cairo-Dock project.
